mapper.update: update dq_ticket set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, dq_product_id = #{dqProductId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, inc_rates = #{incRates,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, inc_days = #{incDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, expired_time = #{expiredTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, used_time = #{usedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, source = #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dq_ticket_id = #{dqTicketId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select dq_ticket_id, user_id, dq_product_id, inc_rates, inc_days, create_time, expired_time, status, used_time, source from dq_ticket where dq_ticket_id = #{dqTicketId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select dq_ticket_id, user_id, dq_product_id, inc_rates, inc_days, create_time, expired_time, status, used_time, source from dq_ticket
